long_description: A tough carryall for work, school, shopping or wherever your bike goes, the Blackburn Local Rear Pannier offers plenty of room and a removable shoulder strap for easy transport to and from the bike. Features a roomy exterior pocket, loops for a flashing light on either side (light not included), and a reflective print to enhance visibility in dim light. Compatible with all standard bike racks. When used with a Blackburn Interlock Bike Rack (sold separately), the Blackburn Local Rear Pannier can be secured on the bike with a single key.
short_description: A tough carryall for work, school, shopping or wherever your bike goes, the Blackburn Local Rear Pannier offers plenty of room and a removable shoulder strap for easy transport to and from the bike.
